Description: Fragment of an ivory (?) plaque: with the name of Nar(mer) incised on one side. The inscription is well preserved, although the sides and back of the fragment are broken.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: 'Macgregor Sale Catalogue (1922)', 676a; P. E. Newberry, 'Menes', 43, fig. 1, in W. M. Brunton (ed.), ' Great ones of ancient Egypt' (London, 1929); P. Kaplony, 'Die Inschriften der Ägyptischen Frühzeit I (Wiesbaden, 1963), 1000, n. 1597; J. Garstang, Zeitschrift für Ägyptische Sprache und Altertumskunde 42 (Leipzig and Berlin, 1905), 63.
